text: Charles Alvin Sanders (August 25, 1946 - July 2, 2015) was an American football player. He played tight end for the Detroit Lions from 1968 to 1977. Sanders was voted into the Pro Football Hall of Fame in 2007. He was born in Richlands, North Carolina. Sanders died on July 2, 2015 from cancer in Detroit, Michigan, aged 68. ==References== Category:1946 births Category:2015 deaths Category:Cancer deaths in Michigan Category:Detroit Lions players Category:Sportspeople from North Carolina Category:African-American players of American football Category:American football tight ends Category:Deaths from bone cancer Category:National Football League broadcasters
title: Charlie Sanders
